content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiffs costs which amount to 94284 eur the procedure lasted for 1 year 2 months and 14 days the case involves the division of a real estate property specifically an apartment between exspouses each party is entitled to half of the property the court used the civil procedure act specifically section 157 to make the decision the plaintiff must reimburse the defendants costs within 15 days or they will have to pay interest the court also explains the process of filing an appeal which must be done within 15 days of receiving the written judgment the appeal must include specific information and be filed by a lawyer or someone with legal qualifications the court fee must be paid at the time of filing the appeal
